titleStmt.title: A Salutation or testimony of true and brotherly love as it did arise in our hearts, unto all as are concerned therein

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Signed at end of sheet: Gilbert Latye, John Bowlover, William Walker, [T]ho. Taunton, Edward Eldershaw, William Taylby, William Tillit, John Pearce, William Brown.
"From our Meeting in London, the 15th of the First Moneth, 1672."
Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library (London, England).
